localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

Roll your way through 20 different mazes across 4 themed areas and reach the goal in the fastest time possible. Or generate a maze for a new experience every time you play.

*Switch between analogue sticks or tilt control anytime.
*20 mazes, each with their own time to beat.
*4 Themes: Ice, Fire, Space, and Dungeon.
*Generate a new maze every time in both small and large sizes.

Package size: 169 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller
- Motion sensor

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

2015(C) James Collins

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
